titles.title: To enforce the law regulating the height of buildings in the District of Columbia by prohibiting the District of Columbia from issuing any building or occupancy permit for the proposed development located at 1328 G Street Northwest unless the development is modified to conform to such law.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on District of Columbia.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 3/24/1995--Introduced. Prohibits the District of Columbia from issuing any building or occupancy permit for the proposed development located at 1328 G Street Northwest, as described in D.C. Act 10-395, unless the development is modified so that the height of the building proposed to be constructed does not exceed 110 feet.
